main.name: Aditya Dattataray Bhogte
main.description: MS in Computer Science at University of Texas at Arlington.
main.bio: My name is Aditya, I'm a Graduate Student at University of Texas at Arlington. Having a six month of experience as a software developer Intern. Possessing a Good Technical skills and problem solving mindset. Currently looking for Software Developer, UX Developer, Cloud developer full-time opportunities starting May 2021
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

testimonials.text: As Aditya's project partner, I have had the pleasure to work with him side by side. He is an innovative member, always bringing solutions to our problems and a new perspective on the research. Aditya is dedicated, enthusiastic, and also a hard-working individual with great potential with an Independent Thinking Capability. In the end, I Would like to add that he is also reliable trustworthy and a responsible individual.
testimonials.user: Priyank Kharat | SAP PI/PO Consultant at Larsen & Turbo Infotech

testimonials.text: I can say Aditya is an intelligent focused engineer with a bright future ahead. The determination and work - ethics he possesses make him a prime candidate for a challenging job. He has a very good command of building a software project with his skills.
testimonials.user: Vishal Sakharpekar | Information Security Analyst at BNP PARIBAS ISPL
